message.body: Can you bring me some stamps and envelopes when you visit?
Also I should be getting my license and a blood donor card soon in the mail at 126
I'm at 126 and no license. Ask dad if he picked it up. Can't we buy envelopes and stamps at the school store? Also I recall passing a post office drivin
g to baileys from Emory. Well do that down there. Can't wait to see u!
I probably can but I'd rather get them for free! Also dad brought me my license but I get a new one after I turn 18 so just be on the lookout
Ah I will buy them for u when we r together. Did u get ur absentee ballot?
Yes and I sent it in already!
I voted for Obama, but the libertarian candidate Gary Johnson had some pretty good ideas. Too bad third party candidates don't have a chance.
Yes I would like to see us go beyond the 2 party choice. Congrats on ur first election!! Remember going into the voting booths with us when u were little?
Yeah! The whole system is different now though :(
At the airport!! Take off at 215. XO
